body:
Heyo, so I  just watched this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4E3ENQTwTvk It's basically a free roam FNAF game were you are located in a house, you're given a flashlight and Freddy is walking around the house, and if he sees you he will run after you. Your objective is to survive tell morning/as long as possible.

So I just wanted to see what your thoughts of this game are :)

title: [Discussion] The Joy Of Creation: REBORN
